name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在未明漏洞（CNVD-2025-29088）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于创建未记录的管理账户，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致未经授权的访问。
solution:
厂商尚未提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：
https://azure-access.com/security-advisories
